subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Leslie Frazier, the defensive backs coach for the Indianapolis Colts, sustained a career-ending knee injury in Super Bowl XX, Jan. 26, 1986, while playing for the Chicago Bears.
snippet: Leslie Frazier, the defensive backs coach for the Indianapolis Colts, sustained a career-ending knee injury in Super Bowl XX, Jan. 26, 1986, while playing for the Chicago Bears.
